OWNER.description: Owners ids, you can have more then one. (options: discord-user-ids)

STATUS_TYPE.description: What type of status does the bot use? (options: playing, listening, or watching) (default: listening)

STATUS.description: What status does the bot display (options: what-ever-you-want) (default: DiamondGolurk on youtube.com) (available variables: {guildsCount}, {usersCount}, and {botPrefix})

HYPIXELAPI_KEY.description: Your hypixel api key (options: your-api-key, false)

OSU_API.description: Your osu api key (options: your-osu-key, false)

SPOTIFY.description: Your spotify api id and spotify secret key (options: [ your-spotify-id, your-spotify-secret-key ], false)

REPORT.description: # How you want reports to be sent (options: [ { USER, SERVER }, { channel-id, user-id } ] )
